headline: Medtronic acquires Fortimedix Surgical to boost surgical portfolio
summary: Fortimedix Surgical’s portfolio consists of articulating instruments for endoscopic, robotic, and minimally invasive surgeries.

headline: MDT Stock Gains From FDA Approval for Its InPen App
summary: Medtronic receives an FDA nod for its InPen app, which will help launch the company's Smart MDI system.

raw.headline: MDT Stock Gains From FDA Approval for Its InPen App
raw.summary: Medtronic receives an FDA nod for its InPen app, which will help launch the company's Smart MDI system.

headline: Medtronic nets FDA nod for smart insulin pen app
summary: The clearance paves the way for the launch of Medtronic’s Smart MDI system, which combines its InPen and Simplera continuous glucose monitor for people who take multiple daily insulin injections.

raw.headline: Medtronic nets FDA nod for smart insulin pen app
raw.summary: The clearance paves the way for the launch of Medtronic’s Smart MDI system, which combines its InPen and Simplera continuous glucose monitor for people who take multiple daily insulin injections.

headline: Medtronic buys surgical instrument developer Fortimedix
summary: Fortimedix develops flexible surgical instruments that are responsive enough to navigate the body and enable endoscopic and minimally invasive procedures.

raw.headline: Medtronic buys surgical instrument developer Fortimedix
raw.summary: Fortimedix develops flexible surgical instruments that are responsive enough to navigate the body and enable endoscopic and minimally invasive procedures.

headline: Franklin Mutual Beacon Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
